message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. This product is truly one-of-a-kind and could be extremely valuable to your business. I'm confident that you'll see the potential it holds. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a fair price considering the potential value and I believe it's a great investment.  Let me know your thoughts.

Alice, I appreciate your offer and the potential this product holds. However, $1500000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to offer $1200000 for the product, given the potential for future negotiation.  I believe this is a fair starting point, and I'm open to further discussion.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1200000 is simply too low for me to consider.  I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm confident the value this product holds justifies a higher price. How about we settle at $1350000? I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the potential of this product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1350000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $1250000.  I believe this is a fair price considering our previous discussions. If you're not able to accept this offer, I'll need to seriously consider my other options.

Bob, I'm going to make one final counteroffer. I appreciate your time and willingness to negotiate. This product truly has the potential to be a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to accept $1300000 as my final offer. I believe this price reflects the value and potential of the product. I'm confident you'll recognize the long-term benefits it brings. If this doesn't work for you, I'll have to consider other options.
